description: Compress images to JPEG XL. Accepted input extensions are PNG, APNG, GIF, JPEG, EXR, PPM, PFM, PAM, PGX, and JXL. More information: https://github.com/libjxl/libjxl.

useCases.description: Convert an image to JPEG XL:
Set quality to lossless and maximize compression of the resulting image:
